title: WeWorkRemotely Jobs Scraper
description: Extract remote job listings from WeWorkRemotely.com across all categories. Supports custom URLs or category-based scraping with full pagination.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific WeWorkRemotely URL. If provided, this overrides the category selection.

category.title: Job Category
category.description: Select a job category to scrape from WeWorkRemotely.

collectDetails.title: Collect job details
collectDetails.description: Enable to scrape full job descriptions and details from individual job pages. Disable for faster execution with basic info only.

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of jobs
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to scrape. Set to a high number to collect all available jobs.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of listing pages to visit. Prevents excessive scraping.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings. Residential proxies recommended for reliable access to WeWorkRemotely.
